def.dt: :someone who buys something The buyer and seller must agree on a price for the property. He's trying to find a buyer for the restaurant.
:someone whose job is to choose and buy the goods that a store will sell
:a piece of land used for growing crops or raising animals She grew up on a dairy farm. Running a farm is hard work. a vegetable farm
:an area of water where fish, oysters, etc., are raised a fish farm an oyster farm
:a situation in which many things of the same kind are for sale, prices are low, and buyers have an advantage over sellers opposite seller's market
